type.description: Prior Approval - Build homes on an adjoining commercial or mixed use building

proposal.description: The addition of homes as upper storeys to the existing commercial premises.

preAssessment.description: It looks like the proposed changes do not require planning permission, however the applicant must apply for Prior Approval before proceeding.

calculated.description: The plannning fee for a Prior Approval application relating to creation of at least 10 but no more than 50 new homes on rooftops, or on a site created by demolishing vacant buildings is £451 per new home

policyRefs.text: The Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications, Deemed Applications, Requests and Site Visits) (England) (Amendment) Regulations 2023

payable.description: In the case of an application that is the first resubmission of an application on the same site that is similar in character and description, no planning fee is payable.
